channel.title: Shiny on R for the rest of us
channel.description: Recent content in Shiny on R for the rest of us

item.title: Shiny
item.description: Friday I listen to an R Podcast regarding the Shiny Developer Conference . I was pysched about performing crazy-cool Shiny App. I have been humbled. No Shiny App emerged this weekend; however, one important things did happen. Working through the Shiny App, I came up with an idea to attach another R programming problem.
